resources.string: Accelerometer mesures acceleration along the three axis.
Gyroscope is a device used for measuring or maintaining orientation and angular velocity. The values are the three axis of angular speed.
Proximity sensor mesures the distance of an object from the front of the phone.
Magnetometer mesures the magnetic field along the three axis.
Light sensor measures the light level front of the phone.
Orientation sensor shows the orientation of the device with respect to the Earth.
